Story Party
The Story
Part I: iPod
Mark and Neem met in high school.
Mark
asked politely to see
stole
Neem's iPod photo.
They started a friendship based on their mutual love of 90s pop music.
Part II: BFFs
They stayed in touch through college.
Mark went to University of Minnesota while Neem went to Michigan State University.
Mark moved to St. Louis after getting a job at Scott Air Force Base.
Neem was
loving
hating
grad school in Michigan.
Mark convinced her to quit and move to St. Louis.
Part III: Anniversary
In March 2014, Mark and Neem started dating.
He thinks their anniversary is 3/14 (Pi Day).
She insists that it's March 11th.
Part IV: St Louis
They have loved living in St. Louis ever since.
Neem loves to drag Mark to Cardinals games.
Mark enjoys pretending to hate St. Louis.
They will be married in St Louis on March 12.
